name: Tabuleiro Bolado - Customizable Board Game
description:
Competitive board game for two players analogue to chess, but with different rules and pieces and a custom game option where you can create your own board. Normal Mode

1v1 Versus local with the normal pieces positions on the board.

Custom Mode

You can position the avaiable pieces on the board any way you want and play with it. Basically making your own game board.

Instrunctions

The board is made of 6x6 squares. All pieces move one square around and attacks on the direction indicated by the symbols on top of it.

The first player to attack the enemy king wins the game.

P.S. The king just moves around and don't attack.
